programme.title: Decathlon Lebanese Basketball League
programme.desc: The Decathlon Lebanese Basketball League is the official Men’s Division 1 Championship in Lebanon, where the country’s top basketball teams compete for the national title. With high-level performances, fierce rivalries, and passionate fans, the league represents the pinnacle of Lebanese basketball and the ultimate stage for the nation’s best talent

programme.title: Al Sabe'e
programme.desc: Conflicts arise between Abi Jaber and Aziz families over money, wealth and influence, and the pace of events escalates after a tragic incident that makes revenge the only way to change the course of the story.

programme.title: Aa Awlet l Matal
programme.desc: Aa Awlet l Matal is a daily program aired during the month of Ramadan. In each episode, it highlights a well-known traditional proverb, explaining its meaning, origins, and story, and connects it to our present-day reality in a simple and relatable way. The program aims to revive traditional proverbs and showcase their wisdom by presenting real-life examples that reflect their continued influence on our daily lives.

programme.title: The Heya Show
programme.desc: The Hiya Show is a platform for Arab women's outstanding achievements and success stories in numerous industries. We believe their experiences, wisdom, and counsel may inspire and empower women globally. At The Hiya Show, we want to inspire good change in women's life, and we've had the privilege of hosting some amazing people. Our show has included Maliha Al Sader, Rayya Al Hassan, Sheikha Intisar Salem Ali Al Soubah, and Nidale Al Ashkar's intriguing stories and wisdom.

programme.title: Farid
programme.desc: The Turkish series "Ferid" (dubbed) follows the story of a reckless young man, the grandson of Khalis Agha, a prominent figure in Antep. Due to his bad behavior, the grandfather decides to marry him off to Serin, a well-respected girl, sparking thrilling and intriguing events.

programme.title: Prime Time News
programme.desc: The evening bulletin that provides you with a complete news roundup of the day in reports and fixed segments

programme.title: Bel Haram
programme.desc: وسط أضواء المسرح الجوال وخلف كواليسه المتهالكة، تضرب المأساة عالم "جود" الصغير، لتجد نفسها وحيدة في مواجهة ماضٍ مثخن بالجراح وحاضرٍ لا يرحم. ومع كل عرضٍ تقدمه الفرقة، تتشابك خيوط الخسارة مع البحث عن عدالة غائبة، في رحلة محفوفة بالمخاطر لكشف حقيقةٍ مدفونة كانت أشد قسوة وخطورة مما تخيلت. هل ينجح سحر المسرح في تضميد جراحها، أم أن الستار سيسدل على حقيقة تنهي كل آمالها؟

programme.title: Mouhafaza 15
programme.desc: Beneath a sky weighed down by crisis, the stories of the Lebanese intertwine with the sorrow of Syrian refugees in a human saga that reveals the harshness of today’s challenges. The events boldly portray the pain of poverty, the struggle to

programme.title: Lobby El Gharam
programme.desc: In the corridors of a bustling hotel that never sleeps, Rustam’s relentless precision collides with Shams’s stubborn resolve, a designer fleeing the confines of marriage. Amid endless weddings, eccentric guests, and unexpected twists, chaos and laughter give rise to an extraordinary love story.

programme.title: Salon Zahra
programme.desc: تدور أحداث الجزء الأول من "صالون زهرة" في حيٍّ شعبي تفتتح فيه "زهرة"، التي تلعب دورها الممثلة نادين نسيب نجيم، صالوناً للتجميل يُمنع دخول الرجال إليه ليكون مكاناً تجتمع فيه سيدات الحي ليتبادلن الأحاديث والأسرار، لكن وصول دفعة من الكراسي إلى الصالون عن طريق الخطأ تغير كل شيء وتقلب حياة "زهرة" رأساً على عقب.

programme.title: Akram mn Meen

programme.title: One Love
programme.desc: “Sharab El Toot (One Love)” is a Turkish-drama series about a modern, idealistic woman named Sherine who raises her two daughters according to her own beliefs and values. Her younger daughter Bessan is still in high school, while her older daughter Rolla studies dentistry at university. Sherine faces a major conflict when Rolla marries a man named Fatih from a devout, conservative family—one whose values clash strongly with Sherine’s own ideals. As the two families attempt to coexist, tensions escalate. Differences in beliefs, expectations, and traditions create ongoing drama. Secrets, power struggles, and emotional turmoil begin to unravel, testing loyalties, love, and the strength of family bonds. It’s a story about love, cultural clash, generational conflict, and how far one will go to protect one’s family and principles.

programme.title: Heyde Ossteh
programme.desc: This one-on-one talk show brings a celebrity or public figure into a raw, intimate conversation with a psychologist and life coach. Set in a minimal space with no distractions—just two chairs, soft lighting, and honesty—the format strips away glamour to reveal the human behind the fame.

programme.title: Ktir Hal2ad
programme.desc: A weekly satirical late night show that covers political and social topics in Lebanon and the world. Presented by Hisham Haddad, the show hosts artists, politicians, media personalities and social media influencers, where they take part in fun challenges and games. "Ktir Hal Aád" (That’s too much) broadcasts every Tuesday at 9:30 pm on MTV.

programme.title: AL Tuffah Al Haram
programme.desc: مسلسل "التفاح الحرام" (Yasak Elma) هو دراما تركية اجتماعية شهيرة تدور أحداثها في إسطنبول، تركز على الصراع بين الحب والطموح والثراء. تدور القصة حول "يلديز" وشقيقتها "زينب" اللتين تعيشان حياة مختلفة وتتداخل حياتهما مع شخصيات ثرية مثل "خالد أرغون" و"أندر"، حيث تتشابك المؤامرات والمكائد عبر مواسمه الستة.

programme.title: Aa Awlet l Matal
programme.desc: Aa Awlet l Matal is a daily program aired during the month of Ramadan. In each episode, it highlights a well-known traditional proverb, explaining its meaning, origins, and story, and connects it to our present-day reality in a simple and relatable way. The program aims to revive traditional proverbs and showcase their wisdom by presenting real-life examples that reflect their continued influence on our daily lives.

programme.title: Al Nesyan

programme.title: Al Ameel
programme.desc: A drama series full of suspense and mystery, the story revolves around the brothers Amir and Wissam, who were separated since childhood. Later, Captain Amir joins a dangerous gang, revealing many complex secrets and facts.

programme.title: Ser W Adar
programme.desc: A social drama series that reflects stories that take place in society, starring the late Fady Ibrahim, Peter Semaan, Rahaf Abdallah, Wafaa Tarabay, Katia Kaady, Natalie Hamawi and other stars.

programme.title: Salon Zahra
programme.desc: تدور أحداث الجزء الأول من "صالون زهرة" في حيٍّ شعبي تفتتح فيه "زهرة"، التي تلعب دورها الممثلة نادين نسيب نجيم، صالوناً للتجميل يُمنع دخول الرجال إليه ليكون مكاناً تجتمع فيه سيدات الحي ليتبادلن الأحاديث والأسرار، لكن وصول دفعة من الكراسي إلى الصالون عن طريق الخطأ تغير كل شيء وتقلب حياة "زهرة" رأساً على عقب.

programme.title: Al Sabe'e
programme.desc: Conflicts arise between Abi Jaber and Aziz families over money, wealth and influence, and the pace of events escalates after a tragic incident that makes revenge the only way to change the course of the story.

programme.title: AL Tuffah Al Haram
programme.desc: مسلسل "التفاح الحرام" (Yasak Elma) هو دراما تركية اجتماعية شهيرة تدور أحداثها في إسطنبول، تركز على الصراع بين الحب والطموح والثراء. تدور القصة حول "يلديز" وشقيقتها "زينب" اللتين تعيشان حياة مختلفة وتتداخل حياتهما مع شخصيات ثرية مثل "خالد أرغون" و"أندر"، حيث تتشابك المؤامرات والمكائد عبر مواسمه الستة.

programme.title: Aa Awlet l Matal
programme.desc: Aa Awlet l Matal is a daily program aired during the month of Ramadan. In each episode, it highlights a well-known traditional proverb, explaining its meaning, origins, and story, and connects it to our present-day reality in a simple and relatable way. The program aims to revive traditional proverbs and showcase their wisdom by presenting real-life examples that reflect their continued influence on our daily lives.

programme.title: Al Nesyan
programme.desc: تدور الأحداث حول زوجين يعيشان حياة سعيدة برفقة ولديهما، إلى حين وقوع حادث يقلب حياتهم رأسًا على عقب، حيث يُختطف ابنيهما فيحاولان البحث عنهما لإعادة لم شمل الأسرة من جديد.

programme.desc: وسط أضواء المسرح الجوال وخلف كواليسه المتهالكة، تضرب المأساة عالم "جود" الصغير، لتجد نفسها وحيدة في مواجهة ماضٍ مثخن بالجراح وحاضرٍ لا يرحم. ومع كل عرضٍ تقدمه الفرقة، تتشابك خيوط الخسارة مع البحث عن عدالة غائبة، في رحلة محفوفة بالمخاطر لكشف حقيقةٍ مدفونة كانت أشد قسوة وخطورة مما تخيلت. هل ينجح سحر المسرح في تضميد جراحها، أم أن الستار سيسدل على حقيقة تنهي كل آمالها؟

programme.title: Mouhafaza 15

programme.title: Al Ameel
programme.desc: A drama series full of suspense and mystery, the story revolves around the brothers Amir and Wissam, who were separated since childhood. Later, Captain Amir joins a dangerous gang, revealing many complex secrets and facts.

programme.title: Lobby El Gharam
programme.desc: In the corridors of a bustling hotel that never sleeps, Rustam’s relentless precision collides with Shams’s stubborn resolve, a designer fleeing the confines of marriage. Amid endless weddings, eccentric guests, and unexpected twists, chaos and laughter give rise to an extraordinary love story.

programme.desc: A social drama series that reflects stories that take place in society, starring the late Fady Ibrahim, Peter Semaan, Rahaf Abdallah, Wafaa Tarabay, Katia Kaady, Natalie Hamawi and other stars.

programme.desc: Conflicts arise between Abi Jaber and Aziz families over money, wealth and influence, and the pace of events escalates after a tragic incident that makes revenge the only way to change the course of the story.
